column4: hello. I'm killing myself trying to figure out how to make this command: mount -o tcp my.computer:/my/share /mnt/bla   ... mount a NFS share so that all users can read it.
Eternal glory to the person who can help me. Surly this must be something you can do on the _client_ side?
part of what you need is the 'umask'.  check the man pages for mount
also make sure you have portmap installed and running
